metadata.description: Curated list of smart money wallets for pump.fun tracking
metadata.disclaimer: These wallets are known traders - verify independently before copy trading. Past performance != future results.

wallets.notes: Known for early entries on pump.fun tokens. Consistently catches 5-10x moves. High win rate on micro-cap plays.
wallets.tradingStyle: Early sniper - buys in first 30 seconds of launch

wallets.notes: Large wallet that accumulates meme coins early. Often moves markets when buying. Watch for accumulation patterns.
wallets.tradingStyle: Accumulator - builds positions over hours, not seconds

wallets.notes: Active on both Raydium and pump.fun. Good at catching tokens that graduate from pump.fun to Raydium.
wallets.tradingStyle: Graduation plays - catches pump.fun tokens hitting bonding curve

wallets.notes: Suspected insider or very well-connected. Often buys tokens 1-5 minutes before major pumps. High conviction plays only.
wallets.tradingStyle: Pre-pump entries - likely has alpha sources

wallets.notes: High volume trader. Not all trades profitable but catches big moves. Good for identifying momentum.
wallets.tradingStyle: Momentum trader - many small bets, occasional big wins

preferredActions: Alert on any buy from priority 1 wallets
Alert on buys >2 SOL from priority 2-3 wallets
Cross-reference: 2+ wallets buying same token = high signal

communityResources.gmgn: https://gmgn.ai/sol/smart-money - Real-time smart money tracking (requires browser)
communityResources.cielo: https://cielo.finance - Wallet tracking and copy trading

notes: ⚠️ IMPORTANT: Wallet addresses above are PLACEHOLDER EXAMPLES in correct format
Real smart money discovery requires manual browser access to gmgn.ai or cielo.finance
Smart money wallets change behavior over time - re-evaluate monthly
Best practice: Monitor for consensus (multiple wallets buying same token)
WARNING: Copy trading is risky - these wallets have different risk tolerance and capital

method1_gmgn: 3. Look for wallets with 60%+ win rate and >100 SOL profit
method3_twitter: 1. Search Twitter/X for 'smart money wallet solana'
3. Community often shares alpha wallets in threads
method4_reverse_engineer: 1. Find a successful pump.fun token on dexscreener
4. If consistent winners, add to tracking list
